scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network bscmainnet
scripts.stage: cross-env NODE_ENV=stage hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network bsctestnet
scripts.stage:verify: cross-env NODE_ENV=stage hardhat run scripts/verify.js --network bsctestnet
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network localhost
scripts.mainTest: cross-env NODE_ENV=development hardhat run scripts/mainTest.js --network localhostTest
